title: The Fit and Flare Dress Trend - Spring Trends 2014 | Lord & Taylor
description:
A fit and flare dress is Spring's most essential waist-defining silhouette, ultra-feminine and sophisticated. This spring trend for 2014 has a girly shape that is so easy to pull-off and has a really fun vibe.


Spring 2014 Fashion Trends:
The "It" List: http://youtu.be/yXHrLocxfMk
Matched Set: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPOpOTg339U
Something Lace: http://youtu.be/5B1xFik8A8M
The Cool Summer Jacket: http://youtu.be/8fsMN6J7Pbg
The Shift Dress: http://youtu.be/N8xLc6N4D9A
The Fit and Flare Dress: http://youtu.be/OOatgLAZXyI
The Message Top: http://youtu.be/lA-VFNTM7d8
The Sporty Trend: http://youtu.be/BvR57aJBaxo
The Crop Top: http://youtu.be/o_JtzURkv2o
Spring Skirts: http://youtu.be/sxAZuceXZIE
Updated Denim: http://youtu.be/iQ-GRlnnwVQ
